mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM ehr_button a, ehr_role_power b WHERE a.button_id=b.power_id AND b.type=2 AND exists (SELECT * FROM ehr_role_user c WHERE c.role_id=b.role_id AND c.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
